input.sentences: this picture of me in my wedding dress leaves me breathless .
i was so emotional having my father walk me down the aisle .
my parents have been my biggest supporters .
my future mother in law is one of the nicest individuals i know .
my husband to be and the officiant are patiently waiting for my arrival .
output.sentences: The bride posed for a wedding picture as the leaves fell around her.
Her emotional father was at her side to walk her down the aisle.
She was grateful to her parents, her biggest supporters.
Thankfully, her mother in law was the nicest of ladies.
Her groom waited patiently with their officiant as she made her way down the aisle.
